author: jeremias
msg: Added a save/restoreGraphicsState pair for the initial coordinate system in PDF output for easier post-processing. The missing q/Q pair caused content to be upside-down when simply a new content stream is appended to the page. With this change the initial coordinate system is restored after FOP's stream is finished.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Part of a fix for DIRSTUDIO-653 (The 'Choose' text for buttons on the AT and OC selection dialog has not been extracted for localization).
German and french translations still pending.
